Intramural Hockey</h1>

Years ago some bright spark decided that our talents in gripping instruments could be applied to holding a hockey stick. Nowadays our intramural hockey team are a force to be reckoned with, wielding our own team strip and sticks and whacking our way to the top. Our Twitter feed</a> usually acts as a live feed to the matches during the season.</p>

[caption id="" align="aligncenter" width="240"]<img class=" " alt="We even have our own strip!" src="http://eums.eusa.ed.ac.uk/wp-content/uploads/images/h500/socials/hockey01.jpg" width="240" height="240" /></a> We even have our own strip![/caption]

If you are a member and want to get involved with hockey, go over to our Members' Facebook Group</a> where you will see all of the updates for fixtures and the like. See the calendar for updates too... If you have any inquiries, get in touch with our Social Secretaries at social@eums.org.uk</a>.</p>
